attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: Honestly, as a single mother, this was way worse than I expected. Right as I opened the app, this cheeto man popped up on the screen and it scared me so bad that my daughter told me that i started â€œshaking on the floorâ€ and iâ€™ve taught her well enough to call the police and it took a bit until I left the hospital and the doctors were baffled because i havenâ€™t been under any stress recently but seeing this putrid looking PUNGENT man staring back at me, my stress level really sky rocketed. Once I got home, i charged my phone and the app was opened automatically as if SOMEONE WAS CONTROLLING MY PHONE. I knew something was wrong and I started to panic and I dropped my phone, walking backwards in fear, and i didnâ€™t notice that my daughter was RIGHT BEHIND ME so i squished her by sitting on her on accident after I fell backwards. The last thing i heard from her was an intense scream and I can never forget the noise. My only daughter is dead, because i KILLED HER WITH TRUMPS DOING. I had a proper funeral and iâ€™m attending therapy now, but after I explained to my sister how my daughter died, she said that trump is one evil orange obese greasy wrinkly ball-sack boy. When i asked why she said that after he told everyone to INJECT CLEANING SUPPLIES TO PROTECT FROM THE CORONAVIRUS, MY UNCLE FOLLOWED ALONG AND DIED THE NIGHT BEFORE. I almost passed out from the shock especially after losing my daughter. It was like my whole life was being cursed. I read the other reviews about a curse but I thought they were just joking since the kids nowadays go tremendous lengths to mess around. But no, please donâ€™t download this app. And if you canâ€™t help yourself, donâ€™t say I didnâ€™t warn you because without trump, my life is better.
